faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Have Questions? We Have Answers.
faq.description: Find answers to the most common queries about our Image To Video AI platform. If you don't see your question here, feel free to reach out.

items.title: What is the typical video generation time?
items.description: Most videos are generated in 30 to 120 seconds. Generation time can vary based on image complexity and current server load. Our Turbo mode can expedite this process.

items.title: Is an account required to use the service?
items.description: Yes, an account is necessary to manage your projects, track your credits, and access your video library. Signing up is free and takes less than a minute.

items.title: Do you offer a free trial or plan?
items.description: We provide all new users with complimentary credits to try our Image To Video AI. For more extensive use, please explore our competitive pricing plans.

items.title: Is the platform mobile-friendly?
items.description: Absolutely. Our website is fully responsive, offering a seamless experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Create on the go, anytime.

items.title: Which image formats are compatible?
items.description: We support standard formats like JPEG, PNG, and WEBP. For optimal results, we suggest using high-resolution images.

items.title: How do I manage the privacy of my creations?
items.description: You have complete control. In your dashboard, you can set each video to be public or private and decide whether or not to include a watermark.
